About.title: Timeless Elegance
About.p1: Founded in the heart of Bali, Mebayu brings together traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design. Every piece is handmade by local artisans using the finest genuine leather.
About.p2: We believe in creating products that tell a storyâ€”pieces that age beautifully and become a part of your daily journey.
